Articles.Content:
Yop !

As everyone now got heavy tanks more powerful ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) We need small one to haunt them & reveal position !

Build for being light , speed & high maneuverable . Got only two small canon , a top speed of 21.5m/s & great acceleration ! But be careful , Light Tank can be destroy very fast so stay in movement , haunt & launch your Heavy Tanks ! You have enough agility to evade most of enemy ammo !

The AMX-Scoot :

![AMX-Scoot.gif?psid=1](https://iwoaaq-sn3302.files.1drv.com/y2pDkPi1N0IJaVjpC31esBNpt7_Wn_2n4NfG_obbc_EKsZjZpkGSg4wUTZMUch_Q15Gc98r-JSsbOlUlq3e8hoZldEbEFjdryBsLmsPFg7DBfhhDpztpWmbxOpJ8GJkI1voOFzov1faygvrA1CWkkuNSjv4nnn6_vr2D4pWzbKFFlY/AMX-Scoot.gif?psid=1)
